channel.title: How Do You Make Shops And Add Items?

but instead of downloading the shop maker it downloads a botnet and you become my zombie on my mIRC chat<3

item.title: How Do You Make Shops And Add Items?
item.dc:creator: @c_u_in_lumb c u in lumb
item.description:
@c_u_in_lumb wrote:

simple :), you will have a config folder, or cfg, folder if not it may be a data folder

if you are useing a older server i will be just somewhere in there and its shops.config

for the shops you have to

shop = # (tab)(tab)(tab) (1 = sell 2 = cant) (tab) (same as number before) (tab) (itemid) (tab) (ammount of that item in shop) (tab) (itemid) (tab) (ammount of that item in shop) (tab) (itemid) (tab) (ammount of that item in shop)

hope you get it[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 23, 2009, 12:47:07 pm[/size][hr]Also you asked, how to make the objects give you items

search in client.java for clickobject or clicking object and make it

if(objectClicked == objectID) {
addSkillXP(ammount, skillID);
}

Read full topic
